name: Camtasia Studio Screen Recording
summary: Learn about .CAMREC files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The CAMREC file is used to store the raw recording of actions on a computer screen. It does not store edits to the recording. Any modifications made to a recording are stored in the .CAMPROJ project file.

The .camrec extension is only used by the Windows version of Camtasia, called Camtasia Studio. Camtasia for Mac uses the .CMREC extension for camera recordings. However, CAMREC files were replaced by .TREC files with the release of Camtasia 8.4.

instructions: You can only open CAMREC files with the Windows version of TechSmith Camtasia 2019 and earlier.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
